dmca.title: Don't YOU Gloat about MY Boat
dmca.body:
Recipient:

Digital Millennium Copyright Act Infringement Notice
----------------------------------------------------

This is a "cease and desist" notice as per the DMCA section 512, under
which I call upon the removal of the material described below from a
web site hosted by Speed Fox, Inc.

(1) The copyrighted work at issue appears at:
    URL: http://www.greatgridlock.net/Sqrigg/carrack.html
         (detailed description of infringement below)

(2) The material that is infringing on my copyrighted work is located at:
    URL: http://www.pollydodger.com/polly.html

    The location contains textual content that has been copied verbatim 
    from my website as follows:

-----begin quote------
As the rigging developed with more mast and sails, also the size of carracks increased. Giant 16th Century warships such as the Portuguese Santa Catarina do Monte Sinai or Henry VIII's (the creator of the Royal Navy) regal namesake Henry Gr
